useCase.name: View Waiter Schedules
useCase.description: As a Manager, I want to view the schedules of waiters in order to manage shifts efficiently.

preconditions.precondition: The Manager is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The Manager successfully views the waiter schedules.

useCase.trigger: The Manager requests to view waiter schedules.

mainSequence.step: Manager requests waiter schedules from the Manager Interface.
Manager Interface fetches waiter schedules from the Server Back-end.
Server Back-end queries the Database for waiter schedules.
Database returns waiter schedules to the Server Back-end.
Server Back-end returns waiter schedules data to the Manager Interface.
Manager Interface displays waiter schedules to the Manager.
